import React from 'react' import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' import CommonHeading from '../common/CommonHeading' import { useTypewriter, Cursor } from 'react-simple-typewriter' const Hero = () => { const pathname = useLocation().pathname; const { typewriter } = useTypewriter({ words: ['Sceleris'], loop: {}, typeSpeed: 100, }) return ( <>

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur. Id mattis at tristique duis.

) } export default Hero
